runs.comm: Nicol comes down the track and awkwardly stabs a ball outside off towards point, they rush through for a single and Guptill might have been gone had the throw hit
inside edges a ball on middle and leg into the pads, rolls behind the stumps, thinks of a run but quickly races back
this is pushed through full on leg, Guptill misses the flick and it hits the pad and rolls to midwicket
short ball on middle and Guptill gives himself some room before clobbering it back past the bowler quite flat and it rushes to the straight boundary
half-volley on off and Guptill drives attractively but picks out the fieldsman at mid-off
goes back in the crease and dabs it down through third man

Guptill pushes Badree's first delivery backward of point, the fielder collects and hits, Dwayne Smith it is, but Nicol has made his ground. Good start in the field though by the boys from the Caribbean
squeezes another ball outside off to third man
gets outside the line of off and looks to sweep but is hit on the pad after missing
works a full ball on off through midwicket, not much turn for Badree today so far
cleanly struck by Guptill, got underneath a full ball on leg after giving himself a touch of room and lofted beautifully over the bowler's head, one bounce over the rope
waits in the crease and defends with an open face into the off side, wants a run but is sent back
Nicol backs away and smears a full ball wide of mid-on who runs round to collect
Fidel bangs in a good bouncer on off, Guptill sways his head out of harm's way
worked off the hips straight to square leg
Guptill repeats the straight loft against the significantly faster Edwards, with a short follow-through he lifts it one bounce over the rope
short ball on leg at an awkward height and angle, Guptill plays it down off his armpits through backward square
short on off, inside edged into the pad and rolls to off allowing them to scamper through
gets forward and defends to cover
comes down the track and hits to long-on
waits in the crease before gently tucking the ball to long-on
Badree appeals for lbw after Nicol again tried to sweep from off stump, may have bottom edged it into the pad
worked away into the leg side softly and Guptill rouses his partner to return for a couple
again beaten trying to sweep, this was down leg and there to be hit but Nicol missed out and was hit on the pad
on comes Narine, Guptill works his first ball straight to square leg, a sedate start by New Zealand
oops, Narine dragged this down horribly outside off and Guptill was so surprised he let it go, it was outside the wide line so will have to be rebowled
defended to midwicket
almost nabs him, induces a leading edge with a ball on leg turning away from the right hander, but it falls short of the cover fielder
stays in the crease and defends to midwicket again, he isn't really picking Narine
and perishes now, skies the attempted loft over the covers and Fidel Edwards settles under it comfortably, big blow for New Zealand

two in two for Narine, gets this to again move away from the right hander off that awkward length on off, Nicol was dragged forward out of the crease and was miles out when Ramdin collected and whipped the bails off, West Indies in the ascendancy
tucks this off the pads to fine leg who races in, but ends up misfielding
backs away and drives attractively with the spin through the covers to open his account
that could have been three down, Williamson defended softly to short leg, Ramdin ran around from behind after seeing Southee set off, he had him struggling had the throw at the bowler's end hit
goes back and cuts a short ball outside off through backward point into the deep where there is no protection

oh dear, terrible running there, they don't even need the third umpire, the West Indians have fielded well again, he late-cut a ball from off stump to third man, hesitated and then set off on seeing Southee coming through, Simmons fired the throw to Badree at the bowler's end who did the needful with Williamson comfortably out
and almost gets it! Flynn the left-hander is the new man in, and pushes forward at a ball on off moving away from him, gets the edge but soft hands mean it falls just short of Gayle
played to point
rocks back and works it through the leg side
this was the carrom ball moving away from the right-hander but it's short enough for Southee to adjust and punch it flat down the ground to Narine's left
gets forward on leg and defends solidly
waits in the crease and cuts to the left of backward point
half-volley outside off is driven to the fielder in the deep
Southee smears a full ball outside off towards cow corner, they go for the second and Flynn makes a desperate dive at the bowler's end to make his ground
this is on leg and beats the flick, hit on the pad and Badree lets out a stifled appeal
Badree gets his first international wicket, it was short on the stumps and Southee heaved it away looking to get it over cow corner but holed out to Charles on the rope
drives to long-off
loud appeal for lbw as it turns down leg, the googly there, beats the flick but was going down
Flynn squeezes a drive through the covers
short on middle and he pulls it off the stumps out to square leg
short on leg and Flynn helps it straight to fine leg and has to rush through to make his ground, New Zealand need boundaries quickly to make a game of this
worked off the hips to midwicket

Narine is enjoying success back in conditions closer to home, Brownlie backed away and exposed the stumps before tamely attempting to push him through the covers, was never near the ball and the death rattle results
Latham lets a conventional off-spinning delivery go outside off
starts with a short loosener outside off which Flynn sees as the opportunity to hit out, moves across and heaves with all his might to get the ball over the cow corner rope
mistimes the pull into his pads this time
defends into the covers
Flynn heaves away out to deep midwicket, the boundaries are coming in staccato fashion for New Zealand which isn't enough for them to get anywhere near this target
Latham is beaten by a slower ball outside off as he tries to pull
horrible wide which is almost off the pitch outside off and Latham cannot get anywhere near it
nicely driven by the son of former New Zealand all-rounder Rod out to deep cover
dabs this down into the deep at third man and comes back for a couple
cuts and cuts hard but can't beat point
drives out through backward point
full outside off and drives down to long-off
waits back in the crease and defends with soft hands into the covers, the required rate is above 13
Flynn makes a clean connection with this delivery, nails a full ball on the stumps down the ground and over the rope
Latham comes down the track and drives nicely through cover point
slaps a short ball off the back foot straight to backward point
short ball on the stumps and Latham swivel-pulls out to deep square leg
short and inside edges the pull into the pad
backs away and smears this down the ground, picks the gap between the long-on and long-off fielders and comes back for the second
big appeal for lbw as Flynn moved across the stumps and tried to pull off leg, rolls to fine leg and they scamper through, definitely going down
and Flynn goes, had no choice as he skied a short ball from off stump high to Gayle on the edge of the circle
should have been run out here, cut it into the point area and set off, quickly went back but unusually the throw from Badree was wide forcing Ramdin to stretch to collect and that saved Latham
gets down on one knee and sweeps behind square, boundaries have been few and far between
goes for a big swing to leg as the ball is fired flat and fast outside off across the right-hander, but makes no contact
paddle sweeps fine off leg stump
comes down the track and clips it softly into the midwicket region and they can come back easily

short ball which takes McCullum on the glove as he tries to play it down, balloons up behind the stumps where Ramdin puts in an ineffectual dive and Bravo gets angry at him as the ball rolls down to fine leg
short outside off and cut down to third man uppishly
Latham plays a lovely chip over the bowler's head, he is a decent golfer and this resembled a stroke from the bunker, full ball on off races to the straight boundary
comes down the track, Bravo sees him coming and bangs in a sharp bouncer which Latham does well to get out of the way of
in the blockhole, jammed out, rolls behind the stumps, Ramdin hits with the throw as they run through but McCullum is in and they don't go upstairs to the third umpire to check

slower ball outside off, McCullum tries to wristily manoeuvre it to the midwicket fence in the manner of that great stylist VVS Laxman but ends up lobbing it towards the edge of the circle where it falls short with the fielder running in
Samuels has cleaned Latham out as he went for a cross-batted heave, it was straight, it was fast and it was flat and the off stump is disturbed
worked to long-on by the new batsman Ellis
misses the slog sweep and is hit on the pad with the ball turning down
flicked off the pads out to deep square leg
full outside off and McCullum has to reach for it as he attempts a slog-sweep, skies it out to the fielder in the deep after several bounces
misses the dab to a ball outside off
played gently to midwicket
edgily played into the covers
skied high in the air down the ground where the fielder safely settles under it, New Zealand nearly done and dusted here
cut off the back foot to the left of backward point
doesn't pick the carrom ball, gets a leading edge which narrowly evades the diving slip fielder
worked off the pads out through square leg, Narine's day is done after totally confounding the New Zealand line-up
that is smoked, gets down on a knee and slog sweeps it with muscle over the cow corner boundary
two in two, short and flat, comes down the track and swings it with abandon over the heads of the fielders stationed on the rope
full on leg and clipped aerially down to long-on
smeared to long-on
worked again down the pitch to the fielder at long-on
full toss outside off is met with an ungainly heave out through square leg
french cuts the pull to a ball on off stump
in the blockhole outside and jammed out to leg
full outside off, smacked to cover, sets off for the run and had given up with the throw coming in - but it missed
full toss follows Bracewell backing away, punched into the covers
beaten outside off trying to cut
full on off and wristily flicked towards the square leg boundary, where the fielder in the deep takes a solid diving catch running in. Unsurprisingly it's Dwayne Smith again
slogs a pull out to deep midwicket
on the pads and flicked to deep square leg

gets down on one knee trying to slog sweep a slower ball from outside off, goes high in the air but has zero distance and Bravo takes the catch and sets off on a celebratory run as West Indies clean sweep the Twenty20 leg of the tour
